original_text: A worker had made the lampstand from one piece of gold that he had made flat with a hammer. From its base to the flowers at the top, he had made it in that way. It was completely like the lampstand that the Lord had shown to Moses.
korean_text: 이 등잔대의 제작법은 이러하니 곧 금을 쳐서 만든 것인데 밑판에서 그 꽃까지 쳐서 만든 것이라 모세가 여호와께서 자기에게 보이신 양식을 따라 이 등잔대를 만들었더라

sentences.original_text: A worker had made the lampstand
that he had made flat with a hammer
From its base to the flowers at the top
he had made it in that way
It was completely like the lampstand
that the Lord had shown to Moses
